title: >>> WALK Don't RUN
body_text:
News is here! What does the future bring ...
DODGEBALL 27, only the sixth Friday event in history, is shaping up to be extraordinary. But it's fair to say that all events seem that way upon their arrivals. No matter how many players, no matter for how long the game is played, DODGEBALL 27 will be awesome. All events, before and after, have and will change the course of history as it is known.
________________________________________
____
> DODGEBALL 29 <
"The Showdown before the Showdown"
Justin Pierce vs. Dan Spengeman in an "Ultimate Poster Contest"!
More on this story in the upcoming weeks.
________________________________________
____
For weeks, many have been wondering what is going on with DODGEBALL 30.
The answer many have been seeking is finally here. For the first time ever, dodgeball will take place during the day! DODGEBALL 30 is officially set for Sunday, March 12th, starting at an early 2PM. As exciting as that may sound, there is more.
Ever since the big "move" to Wall High School, a large majority of players have wanted to return "home". Well it looks like the place where it all began is coming back one more time. The location of DODGEBALL 30 will not be Wall High School ... but rather at Ocean Road Park!
As if DODGEBALL 30 couldn't get any bigger, it just did. Awards, action, friendships, and more will combine into one at the place where it all began some six months ago. What a "homecoming" it will be.
DODGEBALL 30
Sunday, March 12th, 2006
Special start time: 2PM
Location: Ocean Road Park
